info.name: Cerebral veins, deep
info.description: Cerebral veins are described as superficial or deep, depending on whether they drain the superficial or deep aspects of the brain. The deep cerebral veins include the paired internal cerebral veins and the paired basal veins (of Rosenthal).  These deep cerebral veins empty into the Great Vein of Galen which then empties into the straight venous sinus.
info.item: /Gross/Brain stem & Cerebellum/Brain stem/12 Brain stem - parasagittal view
